title: July 18. 1648. By the Commons assembled in Parliament. In the whole management of the late warr, unto which the Parliament was necessitated on the Kingdoms behalf for recovering and securing their religion, lawes, and liberties invaded by the enemies thereof; ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
notes: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Order to print signed: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
